amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide increased levels of funding for many of the authorized civilian science programs for a total authorization of $25.1 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to authorize a total of $25.1 billion, including authorization of NASA's space station.

action.text: Amendment (A033) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Brown (CA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (CA) amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 229 (Roll no. 712).
